id.description: ID of the routing outbound event.

name.description: Name or title of the routing outbound event.

errorEntity.description: Details of the error entity associated with the event.

selfUri.description: Self URI of the error entity.

relatedEntity.description: Details of the entity related to the routing outbound event.

selfUri.description: Self URI of the related entity.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the routing outbound event occurred.

level.description: Level of severity for the event (e.g., INFO, WARNING, ERROR).

category.description: The category of the routing outbound event.

correlationId.description: The correlation ID of the routing outbound event.

eventMessage.description: Message associated with the routing outbound event.

code.description: Error code related to the event message.

messageWithParams.description: Message with parameters for the event.

selfUri.description: Self URI of the routing outbound event.
